name: panther
description: Access and download documents from Studocu (Studeersnel) without requiring an account.
author: Nguyen Phuc Vinh

scripts.bundle: vite build --mode download && vite build --mode popup && vite build --mode viewer
scripts.build: npm run bundle && rm -rf ./pack/* && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version") && zip -r ./pack/panther_v$VERSION.zip src/ manifest.json LICENSE -x src/services/* && unzip ./pack/panther_v$VERSION.zip -d ./pack/panther
